attachments.title: Yet another Makie Galley
attachments.text: An up to date gallery with easy to copy and paste examples for doing nice plots with Makie. Here, a glowing example!

text: Nice, those examples are much closer to "real" plots than many that we have right now, this will be very helpful for people

elements.text: Nice, those examples are much closer to "real" plots than many that we have right now, this will be very helpful for people

text: Indeed, the only thing missing for me will be to have latex fonts…then, they will be publication ready… With plain Plots one can have them, even GR have them… I hope Makie will have them in the near future, until then, I think it will be hard to see a wide use of this library in the scientific community.

elements.text: Indeed, the only thing missing for me will be to have latex fonts…then, they will be publication ready… With plain Plots one can have them, even GR have them… I hope Makie will have them in the near future, until then, I think it will be hard to see a wide use of this library in the scientific community.
